To those transited & those pending transition, you've started earning $BRIBE on the backend as emission has begun. Frontend will display this 14:00PST today as the game begins & marketing starts.

AMA for P2 will be on 9 Feb, 11:00PST. Till then, enjoy the gains, enjoy the game!

40% of P1 staked yet to transit. Pls follow the guide to shift your NFTs from P1 to P2. On 7 Feb, 14:00PST, claim button for $BRIBE will be activated & leveling begins. $BRIBE & $BRIBE-$AVAX LP farms to earn $LOOT will also begin.

Goal is to launch P2 with a fair start for all.

We'll be hosting an AMA on P2 in 2 days to answer any questions, while you enjoy the game and watch your NFTs evolve and get sneakier.

Enjoy the gains, enjoy the game!

Claim & Leveling buttons will start in 12 hours. This gives enough buffer time for everyone to transit to P2 while earning $BRIBE. Staking for $BRIBE and $BRIBE - $AVAX to earn $LOOT will also be live at the same time.

~1000 AVAX LP will be added for $BRIBE, ~$5 USD per $BRIBE.

The moment you've all been waiting for - P2 is here!

To transition, approve the Swap Contract under Heist. Select your NFTs and approve contract. This will move all your NFTs from P1 to P2. Emission for $BRIBE will then start immediately.

TENTATIVE base formulas to start P2 will be up in our WPP in ~2 hrs. If required, we'll modify along the way based on how P2 goes. Frontend integration ongoing so you may see changes as we approach P2. While resolving marketplace issue, launch time's been set to 6 Feb, 15:00 PST.
